amendment.description: Amendment provides definitions for "Federal election activity" and "excluded activity"; and prohibits the use of soft money after the effective date to defray the costs of the construction or purchase of any office building or facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record of February 12, 2002 to preclude parties from using certain funds to defray the costs of construction or purchase of any office building or facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 196 (Roll no. 32).
